POOL_SIZE.description: Connection pool size, keep the maximum number of connections in mind

MAX_OVERFLOW.description: Connection pool maximum overflow, max_connections = pool_size + max_overflow

ADMIN_USERNAME.description: Admin username, allows access to admin only endpoints

ADMIN_PASSWORD.description: Admin password, allows access to admin only endpoints

ADMIN_EMAIL.description: Admin email, allows access to admin only endpoints

MAIL_USERNAME.description: email address for your sending confirmation email. If blank user emails wont be verified.

MAIL_PASSWORD.description: Above email address password. If blank user emails wont be verified.

BACKEND_URL.description: Backend root used for email redirects.

FRONTEND_URL.description: Fronend root used for email redirects
